verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אַל־ [T'al- תַּשְׁחֵ֑ת <S%H516><s%> tash-Chet; Altaschith מִזְמ֖וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <S%H623><s%> le-'a-Saf of Asaph שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> Shir. [or] Song ה֘וֹדִ֤ינוּ <S%H3034><s%> ho-Di-nu do we give thanks לְּךָ֨׀ le-Cha אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, Unto thee O God ה֭וֹדִינוּ <S%H3034><s%> Ho-di-nu [unto thee] do we give thanks וְקָר֣וֹב <S%H7138><s%> ve-ka-Rov is near שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha; for [that] thy name סִ֝פְּר֗וּ <S%H5608><s%> sip-pe-Ru, declare נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6381><s%> nif-le-'o-Tei-cha. thy wondrous works

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> ki When אֶקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> 'ek-Kach When I shall receive מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; the congregation אֲ֝נִ֗י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni, I מֵישָׁרִ֥ים <S%H4339><s%> mei-sha-Rim uprightly אֶשְׁפֹּֽט׃ <S%H8199><s%> 'esh-Pot. I will judge

נְֽמֹגִ֗ים <S%H4127><s%> ne-mo-Gim, thereof are dissolved אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz The earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei-ha; and all the inhabitants אָנֹכִ֨י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi is I תִכַּ֖נְתִּי <S%H8505><s%> tik-Kan-ti I bear up עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-Dei-ha the pillars סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. of it Selah

אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti I said לַֽ֭הוֹלְלִים <S%H1984><s%> La-hol-lim unto the fools אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תָּהֹ֑לּוּ <S%H1984><s%> ta-Hol-lu; Deal not foolishly וְ֝לָרְשָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> ve-la-re-sha-'Im, and to the wicked אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תָּרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> ta-Ri-mu Lift not up קָֽרֶן׃ <S%H7161><s%> Ka-ren. the horn

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תָּרִ֣ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> ta-Ri-mu Lift not up לַמָּר֣וֹם <S%H4791><s%> lam-ma-Rom on high קַרְנְכֶ֑ם <S%H7161><s%> kar-ne-Chem; your horn תְּדַבְּר֖וּ <S%H1696><s%> te-dab-be-Ru speak בְצַוָּ֣אר <S%H6677><s%> ve-tzav-Var neck עָתָֽק׃ <S%H6277><s%> 'a-Tak. [not with] a stiff

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor מִ֭מּוֹצָא <S%H4161><s%> Mi-mo-tza [cometh] neither from the east וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <S%H4628><s%> u-mi-ma-'a-Rav; nor from the west וְ֝לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo, Nor מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> mi-mid-Bar nor from the south הָרִֽים׃ <S%H7311><s%> ha-Rim. exaltation

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- But אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him But God שֹׁפֵ֑ט <S%H8199><s%> sho-Fet; [is] the judge זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh one יַ֝שְׁפִּ֗יל <S%H8213><s%> yash-Pil, he putteth down וְזֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh another יָרִֽים׃ <S%H7311><s%> ya-Rim. one and setteth up

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For כ֪וֹס <S%H3563><s%> Chos [there is] a cup בְּֽיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- For in the hand יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וְיַ֤יִן <S%H3196><s%> ve-Ya-yin and the wine חָמַ֨ר׀ <S%H2560><s%> cha-Mar is red מָ֥לֵא <S%H4392><s%> Ma-le it is full מֶסֶךְ֮ <S%H4538><s%> me-seCh of mixture וַיַּגֵּ֪ר <S%H5064><s%> vai-yag-Ger and he poureth out מִ֫זֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh of the same אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'a-choSh- Surely שְׁ֭מָרֶיהָ <S%H8105><s%> ma-rei-ha but the dregs יִמְצ֣וּ <S%H4680><s%> yim-Tzu shall wring [them] out יִשְׁתּ֑וּ <S%H8354><s%> yish-Tu; [and] drink כֹּ֝֗ל <S%H3605><s%> Kol, all רִשְׁעֵי־ <S%H7563><s%> rish-'ei- thereof all the wicked אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth

וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> Va-'a-ni I אַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> 'ag-Gid But I will declare לְעֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; for ever אֲ֝זַמְּרָ֗ה <S%H2167><s%> 'a-zam-me-Rah, I will sing praises לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hei to the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all קַרְנֵ֣י <S%H7161><s%> kar-Nei All the horns רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked אֲגַדֵּ֑עַ <S%H1438><s%> 'a-gad-De-a'; also will I cut off תְּ֝רוֹמַ֗מְנָה <S%H7311><s%> te-ro-Mam-nah, shall be exalted קַֽרְנ֥וֹת <S%H7161><s%> kar-Not [but] the horns צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik. of the righteous
